# Tables
Want a table? This will create one.

```{r tableo, echo=FALSE}
table1 <- tibble::tribble(
    ~Table.Header,  ~Second.Header,
     "Table Cell",        "Cell 2",
         "Cell 3",        "Cell 4"
  )
knitr::kable(table1,
             caption = "Yeah, man captions for tables")
```
